messages.subject: Commercial Message, scrolls, woodblock, and tanto added to my site.
messages.msgSnippet: Hi there, I have just added a wood block, 2 scrolls, and a Koto sunobe tanto to my website. Please have a look if interested. www.japaneseswordcollector.com
messages.messageBody:
Hi there,

I have just added a wood block, 2 scrolls, and a Koto sunobe tanto to
my website.

Please have a look if interested.

www.japaneseswordcollector.com

Regards

Louis Skebo
